description: This Java class defines a request to enable network join within a Zigbee network, including constructor and execution logic.

classes.name: NetworkEnableJoinRequest
classes.description: A class representing a request to enable joining a Zigbee network for a specified duration.

methods.name: NetworkEnableJoinRequest
methods.description: Constructor initializing the request with an ID and a duration for enabling join.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Performs the action of enabling join on the network and sends a response.
